page.title: 05OUR LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: {FOOD:}We have been finding out about our{local food shops }and where our food comes from.Within a kilometre of of our school there are the following shops. {SUPERMARKET:}Trapwood General Store, Nevins,Spar,Tom Noonan. {BUTCHERS:}Thompsons,Tunstalls. { {GREENGROCERS:}Mrs Hurst in Gillars Green,Brians in Walmsely Rd, Rainfords Farm Shop. {FISHMONGERS:} Brians, Walmsely Rd. {SHOPPING BASKET JULY 1985: a large loaf 42p,250gm butter 57p,500g sugar 52p,125gm tea 62p,200gm coffee_ Â£1.35, 250gm breakfast cereal 74p,200g cheese 69p, 350gm jam 48p, 6 eggs 40p, 450gm bacon Â£1.30, 450gm braising steak Â£1.68, 450gm fillet steak Â£3.90, 3 kilo leg of pork Â£8.00, 3 kilo leg of lamb Â£8.50, cauliflower 50p,450gm apples 30p,450gm potatoes 10p.
